title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 500.6 - Methods of abatement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 500.6 - Methods of abatement

State Regulations

Violations are considered abated when correction of the
condition or behavior that is in violation of the UFPBC, other applicable fire
safety standards or Education Law, section 807 has been made. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
500.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
